import './App.css'; import './App.scss' import React from 'react'; class App extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { breakElem: 5, sessionElem: 25 } } handleBrkIncrement(){ this.setState({ breakElem: this.breakElem + 1 }) } handleBrkDecrement(){ this.setState({ breakElem: this.breakElem - 1 }) } render() { return (

Break Length

{this.state.breakElem}

Session Length

); } } export default App;
